website_summaries.verdict: Engineered to cater to jumping events, the Adidas Adizero TJ/PV is packed with technical innovations that will surely help you beat the competition and even your PR. With its top-notch features, you can expect a lightweight, durable, propulsive, and supportive performance from the Adizero TJ/PV. To help you last in your competition, this track shoe is also fashioned with comfort in mind.
pros: According to a number of athletes, the Adidas Adizero TJ/PV is very comfortable
Quite a few appreciate its lightweight construction
Several users claim that it’s very durable
Many of the purchasers love the support supplemented by this track shoe
A number of users state that it enhanced their performance
cons: Some don’t like the fit of the shoe
A few wearers remark that it’s too tight on foot

customer_reviews.title: Collegiate Jumper Loves Adidas
customer_reviews.text: Im a Collegiate Jumper in the Triple and Long and Adidas never fails when it comes to their spikes I used to wear nike but Adidas over the years have added support to their spikes while forming them to the shape a foot giving them a natural feel when putting them on. Also the reaction of the ground throughout the phases are better as adidas has also improved on the outer soles of their spikes
customer_reviews.author: Claudine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice pole vaulting shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe with excellent traction for pole vaulting. The sizing tends to run a bit large (length) and narrow (width).
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Superior shoe for pole vaulting.
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes for pole vaulting. The flap across the laces is a bit long for narrower feet, but it is easy to trim and no one can tell it wasn't factory trimmed. Light-weight and easy to clean. Superior jumping shoe for serious pole vault athletes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and supportive
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these spikes for both long jump and pole vault. Very sturdy and supportive:)
customer_reviews.author: H. Steinhardt

customer_reviews.title: 17 year old triple jumper likes it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this to triple jump in and a little long jumping. She likes it. She's had it for a few meets now
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaDadof4

customer_reviews.title: Great set of spikes
customer_reviews.text: Son wore these during his senior year, participated in Track and competed as a pole vaulter. Set a few records and was ranked top 10 in California. Great set of spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Great vaulting spike
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! He uses these for pole vault and absolutely loves the feel of them. Lightweight, durable, and sturdy. The spikes are easy to change in these as well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cheslog

customer_reviews.title: She love
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wear size 9.5 and I purchased a size 8.5 it fits perfectly. She love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper to get the shoes online.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He tried the shoes on in store and got the right fit. Cheaper to get online. Liked the style and how they helped his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Hurford

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are safe
customer_reviews.text: A very good show for the triple jump. I used to have problems with my foot from all of the force I was putting into the ground, but these shoes helped to mitigate that problem. They’re also sturdy shoes. My feet and everything feel safe in these while I’m doing an event that can be really taxing.
customer_reviews.author: kamau richardson

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. The design is the best part. Really nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: deseree whitt

customer_reviews.title: Son likes them, as they have relaxed a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Son likes them, as they have relaxed a bit and conformed to his feet. However, they run very narrow. Didn't see width options when purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Bob York

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to return instructions. Great looking shoe, just too big for a girl.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Light and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: So far they fit great and my daughter really like them. She plans on using them pole vaulting and hasn't a chance yet to use them. The are really light and comfortable. She has a poke vault practice in a week or two, so we'll have better verdict in a couple of weeks. Regular track spikes weren't cutting the mustard. They have a thicker almost gym shoe sole. Also want to add that we weren't sure if they sized for men or women. We ordered a size 9 and it turns out they were sized for women because they fit her size 9 shoe perfectly. I will update after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: R. T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! My son was excited to get these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best track spikes I have ever had and these are unisex spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got them for pole vault and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Anjanette L. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Order your true foot size
customer_reviews.text: Good looking,and performing shoe. I ordered it a half size too small
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cooper

customer_reviews.title: ... more the look is clean and the feel is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the nicest triple jump shoes that I own and I would but more the look is clean and the feel is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: The descripción was "12.5M big kig" and they are adult men shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Monika RS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The description was for a youth, but the shoe arrived as an adult size.
customer_reviews.author: Jrand30

customer_reviews.title: Attention these are women sizes!
customer_reviews.text: The size was too small that's why one star, and I couldn't try them on the track!
customer_reviews.author: GABY ISSA-EL-KHOURY

product_meta.title: adidas Adizero TJ/PV Running Shoe with Spikes
product_meta.description: These triple jump and pole vaulting spikes are lightweight, low to the ground and built for speed on the runway. Featuring a midfoot strap for lockdown support when jumping off the ground.
